text: Josefina Villalobos (August 5, 1924 - February 24, 2025) was an American-born Colombian-Ecuadorian public servant. She was the First Lady of Ecuador serving from August 10, 1992 through August 10, 1996 when her husband, Sixto Durán Ballén, served as President of Ecuador. Ballén and Villalobos had eight children. After Ballén left office, the two retired and lived in Quito, Ecuador. On November 15, 2016, Ballén died at the age of 95. Villalobos died on February 24, 2025 in Quito, Ecuador at the age of 100.Josefina Villalobos, viuda de Sixto Durán Ballén, murió en Quito a los 100 años ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1924 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Colombian people Category:First Ladies of Ecuador Category:People from New York City Category:People from Quito Category:Centenarians
